attributes.action: Change the payment of MPs from salaries to means tested awards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the payment of MP was only introduced to allow greater equality so that working class people could become MPs. however it has now gone to far its obscene for MP to vote themselves pay rises while underpaying our soldiers teachers firemen and nurse. being an MP needs to return from being a career back to sacred duty to the people of this isle. Rather the MP should recieve payment at the same minimum levels the set for benefits and minimum wage.
